Detailed Description

Stores device modes using period and skip factor.

Note
MT Mk4 devices are better configured using XsOutputConfiguration, this object is supplied for legacy support only.
See also
XsDeviceMode
XsDeviceModeR

Member Function Documentation

void XsDeviceModePS::setUpdateRate ( int  rate)
inline

Compute the period and skip factor from an update rate and store them.

This function computes the best period and skip factor from the given update rate and stores them in the object.

Parameters
rateThe desired update rate
int XsDeviceModePS::updateRate ( void  ) const
inline

Return the update rate in Hz.

This may be up to 2Hz different from the value that is set in setUpdatRate due to hardware limitations at high update rates.

Returns
The update rate in Hz
